cyclone.name: FRED
cyclone.current_location: about 65 miles SSW of Great Inagua Island
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the southeastern Bahamas, then along or just north of eastern and central Cuba before turning northwest toward the Florida Keys and the eastern Gulf of Mexico
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Florida Keys / far-south Florida

weather_observation.watch_coast: Haiti (northern coast), southeastern Bahamas, and portions of central & eastern Cuba
weather_observation.warning_coast: None in effect (only watches at this time)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Hispaniola, southeastern & western Bahamas, Cuba, Florida Keys, and U.S. eastern Gulf Coast (FL-AL-MS)
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (Boston not listed in wind-probability table)
